dict.acceptation: 在…中[下]布雷；以地雷[水雷]炸毁；

sent.orig: Use mine, yours, his or hers in place of the words in italics.
Methods Forty-six patients with relapsed or refractory aggressive NHL were selected and treated with MINE scheme.
sent.trans: 方法选取46例复发或难治性侵袭性NHL患者，使用MINE作为解救方案进行化疗。

sent.orig: Using sub-laid self-propelled mine to conduct mine blockage is an important way to in mine war.
sent.trans: 通过潜艇发射自航水雷对敌实施水雷封锁是水雷战的重要模式，但目前对潜布水雷障碍的效力计算研究并不充分。

sent.orig: The cause mine pillar destruction Tin Mine was analyzed from observation by photoelastic mine stope 570.
sent.trans: 通过对埋设于570中段光弹性应力计的观测，分析了该中段矿柱破坏的情况及原因。

sent.orig: Magnesium mine, salt mine, Bromine mine, Piezoelectric Crystal.
sent.trans: 镁矿，盐矿，溴矿，压电水晶，铸石用玄武岩。
